instruction: Generate an example of an apology letter to a friend.
output:
Dear [Friend], 
I am sorry for the way I have been acting lately. I know it has been hard and that I have not been there for you as a friend. I am sorry for not responding to your messages, not putting in the effort to reach out, and not spending time with you as much as I should. I understand if you are upset with me and want to know that I am willing to make amends. 

Please know that I value our friendship and acknowledge my wrongdoings. I hope that you can forgive me and that we can move forward in the future.

Sincerely, 
[Your Name]
